name: glintz-api
description: Amadeus API proxy for Glintz travel app

scripts.seed-supabase: tsc --skipLibCheck && node -e "const{AmadeusClient}=require('./dist/amadeus');const{DatabaseService}=require('./dist/database');require('dotenv').config();(async()=>{try{console.log('üè® Generating hotels...');const amadeus=new AmadeusClient();const hotels=await amadeus.seedHotelsFromCities();console.log('üíæ Saving to Supabase...');const db=new DatabaseService();await db.initializeTables();await db.storeHotels(hotels);console.log('‚úÖ Success! Saved',hotels.length,'hotels with photos');}catch(e){console.error('‚ùå Error:',e.message);}})();"
